availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Milby (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Green County, Kentucky, native. Married to Sarah Jane Milby in Green County, Kentucky, in January 1838. Father of William Milby, James Milby, and Thomas F. Milby. Married to Catharine Henderson Milby in Green County, Kentucky, on July 24, 1845. Father of Catharine "Kitty" A. Milby, Juriah J. Milby, Coleman C. Milby, Roda M. Milby, George W. D. Milby, Sarah "Sally" Milby, Mollie M. Milby, Mary E. Milby, and Archy S. Milby. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.
